Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Mission offers mountains, lakes and spectacular views while still being close to Vancouver.  Add affordable house prices and an efficient commuter rail system, and Mission is attracting hundreds of professionals and young families making it Canada’s second fastest growing city. With the development of the 3400 acre ‘Silverdale Lands, Mission will double in size to approximately 80,000 It’s proximity to Abbotsford’s many regional services, and the U.S. border, make Mission a popular up and coming community. The development of ‘Mission ‘Village (timing 2021) is ideally located in the Central Business District and strategically situated next to Mission’s largest employment area the ‘Medical Campus of Care’.  With over 1000 employees in the immediate area, Mission  Village offers a unique opportunity for new businesses to serve a large employment area steps from busy Lougheed Highway.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: MISSION VILLAGE | FOR LEASE OR STRATA PURCHASE NEXT TO MISSION'S "MEDICAL CAMPUS OF CARE"
